meanings.definition: To be contingent on a particular factor or circumstance.
meanings.sent1: Her success was hinging on the outcome of the final exam.
meanings.sent2: The plan's success is hinging on everyone arriving on time.
meanings.sent3: The party's fun was hinging on the arrival of the clown.
meanings.sent4: His happiness seemed to be hinging on her approval.
meanings.sent5: The project's completion hinging on securing additional funding.

meanings.definition: To attach or join with a hinge.
meanings.sent1: He was hinging the door to the frame carefully.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter was hinging the cabinet doors expertly.
meanings.sent3: She was hinging the gate shut to keep the dog in.
meanings.sent4: The lid was hinging open slowly as he lifted it.
meanings.sent5: The artist was hinging the painting onto the wall securely.

meanings.definition: To pivot or turn on a hinge.
meanings.sent1: The door was hinging open with a creak.
meanings.sent2: The gate was hinging shut as the wind blew.
meanings.sent3: The window was hinging open to let in fresh air.
meanings.sent4: The lid was hinging back, revealing the hidden compartment.
meanings.sent5: The trapdoor was hinging downwards, revealing a secret passage.
